Unarmored.Effect: Start every combat with Shielding equal to 2 * Your Dexterity (0 minimum).
Unarmored.Description: No armor or very little clothing, such as a bare chest or lightly clothed body. You rely on your reflexes more than on armor.

Robes.Description: Robes vary in purpose and design. They can symbolize a wizard's robes, a priest's apparel or a noble's dress.

Leather Armor.Effect:
+4 Initiative
Start every combat with 1 Protection Token.
Leather Armor.Description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil.
Leather Armor.Notes: When you are attacked, 1 Protection Token is automatically consumed to reduce its Damage by 50%.

Padded Armor.Effect: 50% Resistance to Smash and Force Damage
Padded Armor.Description:
Padded Armor consists of quilted layers of cloth and batting. Its thickness is both a pro and a con, as it absorbs water quickly.
Alternatives: Hide Armor (50% Resistance to Smash and Cold Damage)

Chain Mail.Description: Made of interlocking metal rings, Chain Mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows.

Splint Armor.Effect: Start every combat with 2 Melee Protection Tokens.
Splint Armor.Description: This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible Chain Mail protects the joints and allows soldiers to hold their ground more efficiently!
Splint Armor.Notes: When you are attacked, 1 Protection Token is automatically consumed to reduce its Damage by 50%.

Scale Mail.Effect: Once per turn, after you attack a Worthy Enemy within 1 meter of you, gain 1 Protection Token.
Scale Mail.Description: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish.
Scale Mail.Notes: When you are attacked, 1 Protection Token is automatically consumed to reduce its Damage by 50%.

Plate Armor.Downside: Your attacks beyond 3 meters range have -2 Penalty.
Plate Armor.Description: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
